Description: Pondside condo duplex for rent with off street parking.. Perfectly and conveniently located on Perkins Street, with Jamaica Pond right at the corner. A few minutes from Longwood Medical Area, VA Hospital, Brookline Village, Emerald Necklace, Whole Foods on Centre St and close the JP nice shops, cafes and restaurants. This 2 bed/1 bath duplex features two levels of living area, with 2 bedrooms in the upper level. The master bedroom has wall AC. Full bathroom in this level between the bedrooms and in-unit washer/dryer.. Living room in the lower level leads to the updated kitchen. There is also a storage closet. The kitchen has granite counters, stainless appliances, gas stove and dishwasher. Heating is gas ( not included in the rent). Tenants pay for their own utilities. One cat or a small/medium sized dog allowed. Very close to the Green Line on South Huntington. Available now.
